title: Full-time weekly hours of work , by gender 2000 - 2019 | UK Statistic
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Men, and Women. The y axis denotes Average weekly hours and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Men, and Women are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Average weekly hours in descending order is: 1. Men, and lastly, 2. Women.
Throughout the period, Men generally had the highest Average weekly hours relative to others with an average of 39.18, and it reached its maximum at 2000 with a value of 39.8.
Women mostly had the least Average weekly hours with a mean value of 34.07, which peaked at 2014, and 2019 with a value of 34.5.
